metadata.synopsis: Astarion addresses a defeated Cazador after their fight. He pulls his former master from the coffin where he's recovering and has to decide what to do with him - kill him or carve the scars on Astarion's back into Cazador's and then use him as a sacrifice in the ritual.

89.text: Although, what of them? What are you going to do with the ones we brought here?

506.text: A beast is a beast, and I am not going to be freed of his chains just to put on yours.

595.speaker: Pale Petras
595.text: A beast is a beast, and I am not going to be freed of his chains just to put on yours.

338.speaker: Astarion
338.text: Start killing people and I'll stop you. Just like I stopped Cazador.

446.speaker: Pale Petras
446.text: Cazador was alone - we are not. And we will not let you stand in the way of our freedom.

360.text: Cazador was alone - we are not. And we will not let you stand in the way of our freedom.

520.speaker: Pale Petras
520.text: Cazador was alone - we are not. And we will not let you stand in the way of our freedom.

117.speaker: Dalyria
117.text: Wait, what of the others? What are you going to do with the ones we brought here?

537.speaker: Astarion
537.text: Do what you like, but you're dealing with the consequences.

355.speaker: Narrator
355.text: *Your old master lies dead, never to control you again. You're free - unlike the thousands of spawn that are still trapped in his cells.*
355.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up from his knees

510.speaker: Astarion
510.text: Kill Cazador and abandon the ritual.

311.speaker: Narrator
311.text: Carve the symbols into his back.

318.speaker: Astarion
318.text: Carve the symbols into his back.

398.speaker: Astarion
398.text: Try to remember the runes on your back and carve them into Cazador's flesh.

280.speaker: Astarion
280.text: Enter your companion's mind and see the scars through their eyes.

621.speaker: Astarion
621.text: Give him his wish - kill him.
621.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

536.speaker: Cazador Szarr
536.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion, hunkered down before him, stabs Cazador in the chest. Cazador slumps to the ground, lying on his back.
Astarion rams the knife into Cazador's chest over and over, letting out centuries of rage.

530.speaker: Astarion
530.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion is kneeling by the body, covered in gore, panting. The knife falls from his hand.

469.speaker: Dalyria
469.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion still kneeling. The voice of one of Cazador's other spawn comes from behind him.

65.speaker: Dalyria
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Timidly walking over to look at Cazador's body

271.speaker: Astarion
271.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion gets up off his knees
